name: RJM Pinball & Stuff... Prepare 4 Evil
description:
This starts out as a pinball game and once you go through the Green Gates it takes you to other rooms. In one room, you must build a ladder, watch the have hidden numbers and have to be in order. Then RJM climbs out of the dungeon. If you're battling demons, you must have the proper tools. So, drag his tools through the library and the moving book cases to their proper place. If you are at the haunted house, tap or click on the demons to score points and make sure you don't tap or click on an angel. You need to score 7 demons before the blood runs all the way down the path.

Complete all rooms to get your score.
